SEARCH
Package supermarket.domain.supermarket

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
supermarket.domain.supermarket.Shelf
public class Shelf extends Object
Represents a shelf in a store. Each shelf holds products at specific positions and can be resized as needed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Shelf(int id, String shelfType, int size)
    Constructs a new Shelf with the specified ID, type, and size.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shelf

      public Shelf(int id, String shelfType, int size)
      Constructs a new Shelf with the specified ID, type, and size.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the shelf.
      shelfType - The type or category of the shelf.
      size - The initial size of the shelf (number of product positions).

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Retrieves the ID of the shelf.
      Returns:
      The shelf ID.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Retrieves the current size of the shelf.
      Returns:
      The size of the shelf (number of positions).

    • getShelfType

      public String getShelfType()
      Retrieves the type of the shelf.
      Returns:
      The type of the shelf.

    • getStoredProducts

      public List<Integer> getStoredProducts()
      Retrieves the list of product positions on the shelf. Each position corresponds to a product barcode or null if the position is empty.
      Returns:
      A list of product barcodes, representing the positions on the shelf.

    • clearShelf

      public List<Integer> clearShelf()
      Clears the shelf. All products will be withdrawn from the shelf, and returned as a list of barcodes.
      Returns:
      List of barcodes of all products removed (the shelf will end up empty)

    • setShelfType

      public List<Integer> setShelfType(String shelfType)
      Sets a new type for the shelf. All products will be withdrawn from the shelf, and returned as a list of barcodes.
      Parameters:
      shelfType - The new type for the shelf.
      Returns:
      List of barcodes of all products removed (the shelf will end up empty)

    • setShelfSize

      public List<Integer> setShelfSize(int newSize)
      Adjusts the size of the shelf. If the new size is larger, the shelf is expanded. If the new size is smaller, the shelf is reduced, and any products at positions beyond the new size are removed.
      Parameters:
      newSize - The new size for the shelf.
      Returns:
      Returns list of removed barcodes (in case the shelf shrunk in size and removed products at the end

    • placeProduct

      public Integer placeProduct(ProductInfo productInfo, int position)
      Places a product at the specified position on the shelf.
      Parameters:
      productInfo - The info of the product to place.
      position - The position on the shelf to place the product.
      Returns:
      The barcode of the product that was removed (previous product in that position, null if none).

    • withdrawProduct

      public void withdrawProduct(int productBarcode)
      Withdraws the product with the given barcode if present. The position will be cleared and the product removed from the set of stored products.
      Parameters:
      productBarcode - The barcode of the product to withdraw.

    • swapPositions

      public void swapPositions(int position1, int position2)
      Swaps the products at two specified positions on the shelf. Throws an error if one position is out of bounds
      Parameters:
      position1 - The first position.
      position2 - The second position.

    • containsProduct

      public boolean containsProduct(int productBarcode)
      Checks if a specific product is stored on the shelf.
      Parameters:
      productBarcode - The barcode of the product to check.
      Returns:
      true if the product is stored on the shelf, false otherwise.

    • isPositionFree

      public boolean isPositionFree(int shelfPosition)
      Checks if a specific position on the shelf is free (i.e., does not contain a product).
      Parameters:
      shelfPosition - The position to check.
      Returns:
      true if the position is free, false otherwise.

    • containsProducts

      public boolean containsProducts()
      Returns a boolean indicating if the shelf contains any products.
      Returns:
      True if the shelf contains any products, false otherwise.
